Header: MISSION OF HONOR to be Released in Theaters and on Digital 3/15
Content: Mission of Honor is a drama film directed by David Blair and written by Robert Ryan. It  is the story of a group of brave Polish pilots known as Squadron 303 who fought in the skies over England in WW2, not just to keep Great Britain free from the Nazis, but also to keep alive the very idea of their own country, which had existed in its modern form for barely twenty years before it was crushed between the opposing jaws of Germany and Russia. The film will be released on the 15 th of this month by  Cinedigm  productions.
